spans.name: LLMChain
spans.status_message:
Invalid json output: ### Travel Summary
#### Weather Information
* **San Francisco (SFO)**: Partly Cloudy, 67°F (19°C), 64% Humidity
* **Los Angeles (LAX)**: Sunny, 84°F (29°C), 56% Humidity

#### Flight Options
| Airline | Flight Price | Travel Dates | Direct Booking Link | Accessibility Features | Special Assistance Services | Baggage Allowance | Cancellation Policy |
| --- | --- | --- | --- | --- | --- | --- | --- |
| American Airlines | $250 | July 3rd | [Book Now](https://www.aa.com/) | Wheelchair accessible, Adaptive seating | Special assistance available | 1 carry-on, 1 checked bag | 24-hour cancellation policy |
| Delta Air Lines | $280 | July 5th | [Book Now](https://www.delta.com/) | Wheelchair accessible, Adaptive seating | Special assistance available | 1 carry-on, 1 checked bag | 24-hour cancellation policy |
| United Airlines | $300 | July 2nd | [Book Now](https://www.united.com/) | Wheelchair accessible, Adaptive seating | Special assistance available | 1 carry-on, 1 checked bag | 24-hour cancellation policy |

#### Next Steps
To confirm your flight and accessibility features, please contact the airline directly. You may also want to consider reaching out to the airline's disability support team to request accommodations such as wheelchair assistance or adaptive seating. Are you ready to book your flight or would you like to explore more options?
For troubleshooting, visit: https://python.langchain.com/docs/troubleshooting/errors/OUTPUT_PARSING_FAILURE

attributes.mlflow.spanInputs:
{"history": "I want to fly from SFO to LAX during the week of July 4th. I use a wheelchair and need accessible flights. Please show me the weather at both locations and the best flight options.
I want to fly from SFO to LAX during the week of July 4th. I use a wheelchair and need accessible flights. Please show me the weather at both locations and the best flight options.
### Weather Information
#### San Francisco (SFO)
* Current Weather: Partly Cloudy
* Temperature: 67°F (19°C)
* Humidity: 64%
#### Los Angeles (LAX)
* Current Weather: Sunny
* Temperature: 84°F (29°C)
* Humidity: 56%

### Flight Options
Here are some accessible flight options from SFO to LAX during the week of July 4th:

| Airline | Flight Price | Travel Dates | Direct Booking Link | Accessibility Features | Special Assistance Services | Baggage Allowance | Cancellation Policy |
| --- | --- | --- | --- | --- | --- | --- | --- |
| American Airlines | $250 | July 3rd | [Book Now](https://www.aa.com/) | ✅ Wheelchair accessible, ✅ Adaptive seating | ✅ Special assistance available | 1 carry-on, 1 checked bag | 24-hour cancellation policy |
| Delta Air Lines | $280 | July 5th | [Book Now](https://www.delta.com/) | ✅ Wheelchair accessible, ✅ Adaptive seating | ✅ Special assistance available | 1 carry-on, 1 checked bag | 24-hour cancellation policy |
| United Airlines | $300 | July 2nd | [Book Now](https://www.united.com/) | ✅ Wheelchair accessible, ✅ Adaptive seating | ✅ Special assistance available | 1 carry-on, 1 checked bag | 24-hour cancellation policy |

Please note that the prices and availability may vary depending on the time of booking and the airline's policies. I recommend checking with the airlines directly for the most up-to-date information and to confirm their accessibility features and special assistance services.

Additionally, you may want to consider contacting the airlines' disability support teams to inform them of your needs and to request any necessary accommodations, such as wheelchair assistance or adaptive seating.

I hope this helps, and happy flying!"}

attributes.text:
Prompt after formatting:
[32;1m[1;3mYou are a travel assistant. Given the following conversation history, generate a single, user-friendly markdown summary for a travel UI. Include weather, a markdown table of flight options, accessibility features, and any follow-up questions. Do not include the user's original question or any code blocks or JSON. Output only the markdown in the 'markdown' field.

Conversation history:
I want to fly from SFO to LAX during the week of July 4th. I use a wheelchair and need accessible flights. Please show me the weather at both locations and the best flight options.
I want to fly from SFO to LAX during the week of July 4th. I use a wheelchair and need accessible flights. Please show me the weather at both locations and the best flight options.
### Weather Information
#### San Francisco (SFO)
* Current Weather: Partly Cloudy
* Temperature: 67°F (19°C)
* Humidity: 64%
#### Los Angeles (LAX)
* Current Weather: Sunny
* Temperature: 84°F (29°C)
* Humidity: 56%

### Flight Options
Here are some accessible flight options from SFO to LAX during the week of July 4th:

| Airline | Flight Price | Travel Dates | Direct Booking Link | Accessibility Features | Special Assistance Services | Baggage Allowance | Cancellation Policy |
| --- | --- | --- | --- | --- | --- | --- | --- |
| American Airlines | $250 | July 3rd | [Book Now](https://www.aa.com/) | ✅ Wheelchair accessible, ✅ Adaptive seating | ✅ Special assistance available | 1 carry-on, 1 checked bag | 24-hour cancellation policy |
| Delta Air Lines | $280 | July 5th | [Book Now](https://www.delta.com/) | ✅ Wheelchair accessible, ✅ Adaptive seating | ✅ Special assistance available | 1 carry-on, 1 checked bag | 24-hour cancellation policy |
| United Airlines | $300 | July 2nd | [Book Now](https://www.united.com/) | ✅ Wheelchair accessible, ✅ Adaptive seating | ✅ Special assistance available | 1 carry-on, 1 checked bag | 24-hour cancellation policy |

Please note that the prices and availability may vary depending on the time of booking and the airline's policies. I recommend checking with the airlines directly for the most up-to-date information and to confirm their accessibility features and special assistance services.

Additionally, you may want to consider contacting the airlines' disability support teams to inform them of your needs and to request any necessary accommodations, such as wheelchair assistance or adaptive seating.

I hope this helps, and happy flying![0m
